name: Wingman (Noah Brinkman)
description:
Don't have the guts to talk to your crush?  Send them a note by airplane! 

Introducing Wingman. Throw your paper airplane through the school to your crush by making sure the right fans are turned on/off to get the right path.

Controls:
-Move the camera by dragging
-Activate fans/burners by clicking them (if activatable)
-Drag the paper airplane back to throw.
